sqlMap.select: SELECT A.MENU_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_UPPER_ID , MENU_DIV_CD , MENU_SNO , USE_FLAG , MENU_LINK_SNO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MENU B, TB_MENUGRPAUTH C WHERE B.MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID AND C.MENU_GRP_ID = #menu_grp_id# AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_UPPER_ID) SUB_CNT FROM TB_MENU A JOIN TB_MENUGRPAUTH B ON A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID WHERE MENU_DIV_CD = '1' AND B.MENU_GRP_ID = ##menu_grp_id## ORDER BY MENU_UPPER_ID, MENU_SNO

SELECT A.MENU_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_UPPER_ID , MENU_DIV_CD , MENU_SNO , USE_FLAG , MENU_LINK_SNO , MENU_CONN_URL , ROW_IDX , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MENU B, TB_MENUGRPAUTH C WHERE B.MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID AND C.MENU_GRP_ID =#menu_grp_id# AND A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_UPPER_ID) SUB_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.* , (CASE @VUPPER_MENU_ID WHEN A.MENU_UPPER_ID THEN @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 ELSE @ROWNUM:=1 END) ROW_IDX , (@VUPPER_MENU_ID:=A.MENU_UPPER_ID) VUPPER_MENU_ID FROM TB_MENU A, (SELECT @VUPPER_MENU_ID:='', @ROWNUM:=0 FROM DUAL) B ORDER BY A.MENU_UPPER_ID, A.MENU_SNO ) A JOIN TB_MENUGRPAUTH B ON A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND MENU_DIV_CD = '2' AND B.MENU_GRP_ID = #menu_grp_id# ORDER BY MENU_UPPER_ID, MENU_SNO

SELECT MENU_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_UPPER_ID , MENU_DIV_CD , MENU_SNO , USE_FLAG , MENU_LINK_SNO , MENU_CONN_URL , MENU_UPPER_ID , MENU_SNO , ROW_IDX FROM ( SELECT A.* , (CASE @VUPPER_MENU_ID WHEN A.MENU_UPPER_ID THEN @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 ELSE @ROWNUM:=1 END) ROW_IDX , (@VUPPER_MENU_ID:=A.MENU_UPPER_ID) VUPPER_MENU_ID FROM TB_MENU A, (SELECT @VUPPER_MENU_ID:='', @ROWNUM:=0 FROM DUAL) B ORDER BY A.MENU_UPPER_ID, A.MENU_SNO ) A JOIN TB_MENUGRPAUTH B ON A.MENU_ID = B.MENU_ID AND MENU_DIV_CD = '3' AND B.MENU_GRP_ID = #menu_grp_id# ORDER BY MENU_UPPER_ID, MENU_SNO
